title: What are the best working models which could be made to go for national science exhibition? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ashutosh, In my understanding the scientific challenge for our country still remains energy. The cost we pay for Conventional energy sources like petrol, diesel, coal is very high and the burden is carried by the less-than-10% taxpayers. Your scientific project could cover the following- A system that stores energy in batteries drawing power from solar cells, novels, biomass, piezoelectric, mech rotors moved by wind or air.Robotic system that uses that energy for useful, movement and work.Programmable interface to provide action steps to robot in simple language.For further guidance or help needed can you message me separately in quora?
